frontmatter.title: I was wrong about the Liberal Arts

nodes.excerpt:
To me,
non-fiction >> fiction

…but recently I’ve grown sick of New Content™ about tech, business, & self-help

Ted Talks™
are for Ideas Worth Spreading

This list
is for Links Worth Spreading

"I love math:
it's repeatable & objective

The other subjects
are too 'up to interpretation'"

--me, foolish high schooler

Which sounds most intimidating?

  • applying for jobs out of reach
  • asking that stranger on a date
  • building a sustainable business
